features: KEEPS YOU WARM IN COLD TEMPERATURES - This knit thermal full face cover ski mask is perfect for keeping your entire head/face warm during these colder temperatures.

HIGHLY FUNCTIONAL - 3 holes cut with precision for allow the eyes and mouth to stay exposed for maximum efficiency while wearing. Perfect for keeping your face out of harms way during cycling, snowboarding, and skiing events.
SOFT AND COMFORTABLE MATERIALS - Knitted ski mask made out of 100% acrylic, keep your face warm and still allows it to breathe. Purchase consists of 1 mask.
ONE SIZE FITS MOST - Measuring at 14" x 7" inches, this ski mask is sure to fit over practically any size adult head.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Z Outlet is here to make all of life's fun moments a memorable time! With our party supply selection to help make remarkable themes come to life - From baby showers, birthday parties, bridal showers, weddings, graduation parties and more! Our items are suited for event planners, decorators, caterers, as our party favor products fit a variety of themes. With a vast selection of other house hold items as well. We make party planning an exceptionally great time while also having fun. With Super Z Outlet's wide selection, you are sure to find something for that special celebration!

Face thermal is ideal for protecting your face against the elements. Perfect skiing mask for keeping your face out of harms way during cycling, snowboarding, and skiing events. When in the mountains and you need to keep warm and protect your skin, this jet ski mask will be reliable.

Great for camping, hunting, fishing, hiking, outdoor activities and more! Introducing our versatile collection of ski masks, perfect for keeping you warm and protected while hitting the slopes. Whether you're a seasoned skier or just starting out, we have a wide range of ski masks to suit your needs. One size fits all unisex design for children and adults of all ages. Ideal sports mask for riding, skiing, and other outdoor sports. Also perfect to be the essential equipment of war games, paintball and hunting in forest areas.

Unisex design for children and adults of all ages. Our men's ski masks and women's ski masks are a combine the styles of a balaclava mask, 3-hole ski masks, knitted ski masks and ski mask beanies. Used as a seasonal cold weather protective headgear with its breathable material that allows for easy breathing with protection. Provides excellent protection to your face, ears and neck from harsh climate temperatures.

An essential equipment for war games, paintball and hunting in forest areas. Do you work outdoors and need protection when the Winter season becomes harsh? This is mask that is the perfect compliment to an outfit that is made to stand up to the relentless cold temperatures. In the summer, it sweat absorption and protection from the sun. An essential face equipment of fun play war games like paint balling. During the summer, it is sweat absorption and protect from the sun. It can be used for many activities such as skiing, snowboarding, motorcycling, cycling, paintball, and backpacking.

Soft and stretchy without am overly tight feeling. The thermal face mask allows for complete face coverage, yet is thin enough that it can be worn under a hat and layered under clothing, jackets or scarves! The balaclava mask has 3 holes that are cut with precision to allow the eyes and mouth to stay exposed for maximum efficiency. Measuring at 14" x 7" inches. This unisex ski mask will fit over practically any size adult head. Knitted ski mask is made out of 100% acrylic fiber material. Each order includes 1 mask in total.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and awesome
reviews.reviewText: I run in the suburbs of Chicago, even in the winter, so when it gets to be single digits or negatives I need to wear a mask to protect my face and neck. This was cheap but has been very effective. Im 5'11 and it fits me perfectly. It is comfortable and works great. Very happy I purchsed this, as I lost my previous mask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kinda Cheaply Made
reviews.reviewText: Arrived quickly and just as shown however after using just twice it started to Unravel and it’s made kinda cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for snow blowing
reviews.reviewText: Product came a day early and was just what I expected. Will work great for keeping warm from drifting snow while working outside

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Let's start with the pooe craftsmanship. The stitching between the eyes and nose came undone after 2 wears . Clearly not much went into these hats . Not happy with this purchase. If I had four hands these would get four 👎👎👎👎

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: When I couldn't find a proper balaclava I used for years, I got this as a cheap replacement. As others have mentioned, the eye slits are separated by a stitch not really well centered, so one opening was larger than the other. No biggie until another cheap feature kicked in; the material doesn't breathe well, so when shoveling thick snow I began to sweat. The sweat made the smaller eye slit slide, and the thicker edge kept poking in my eye. I chose to cut the center stitch so now there is a single wide opening for both eyes.Later on I used it for a leisurely walk where I didn't sweat and it all felt better.Later yet I found the good balaclava, so I doubt I will ever use this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cover for your face in the winter time and going for a walk
reviews.reviewText: Great cover for your face in the winter time and going for a walk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great ski mask
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality and good fit. Great value for the price. Had a hard time finding this product in any of the local stores - so Amazon came through again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of the grey ones hoping they would be a much lighter grey, they're more of a regular grey. That's okay though. The eye holes and the mouth holes are comically irregular, to the point where they actually have their own facial expressions. That's okay though. I bought them for the sole purpose of putting them over my headrests to use as a headrest cover. The fact that the quality of these masks are totally messed up makes it perfect for what I bought them for. My headrests now have facial expressions. 🤣 However, if I were to use these for their intended purpose, I'd be giving a much lower rating because they're definitely crappy-made masks. I can't get over how bad the eye holes and mouth holes are. 😂
